Title: Establishes and funds the close the waitlist fund
Summary: Establishes and funds the close the waitlist fund by utilizing a tax surcharge to pay for providing senior services to individuals who have been waitlisted to receive such senior services.
LawCode: Add ยง99-ss, St Fin L; add ยง602, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law and the tax law, in relation to establishing and funding the close the waitlist fund
